text:
Buried Secrets

A dim alley, tension in the air.  
He feels the weight of his actions.  
He: “Hurry! No time to waste.”  

He lifts the stone, heart racing.  
He: “This is it… my secret place.”  

Joy floods him as he steps away.  
He: “I’ve buried my tracks! No one will know.”  
He laughs nervously, feeling free.  

Suddenly, doubt creeps in.  
He: “What if they find it? What if…?”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** The protagonist experiences a mix of intense joy and anxiety after burying evidence of his crime, believing he has successfully hidden his tracks.
